////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// ECE 2504 Design Project 3: Data memory values
// 
// This text file contains the initial contents of the data memory in hex. The memory is 16 bits
// wide, which is 4 hex digits per address.
//  
// MODIFY THE CONTENTS of the contents of this file to use the last four digits of your student ID
// number in BCD as the starting constant for your program. Your student ID should be store in
// location 0, where "2504" is below.
//
//  "@<number>" specifies the memory location of the next line of data. Subsequent lines are in
// consecutive locations.
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
@0
2504
3544
4514
0000
0000
0000
0000
0000
0000
0000
0000
0000
0000
0000
0000
0000
0000
